title: Critical Thinking Enhancement Program Through ICT-Based Social Inquiry Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Students use personal devices (BYOD) for online data analysis and collaboration, with offline classes focusing on discussion and feedback sessions. Emphasizes real-world problem-solving through project-based learning centered on community issues

learning_goals: Students can systematically analyze social phenomenon data and present argumentative structures using ICT tools.
Students can creatively propose multidimensional solutions to complex social issues through project-based learning.
Students can critically review and improve their arguments based on peer assessment and teacher feedback.

resources: Digital Content Creation Tools (e.g., Canva, Padlet)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
